turkish_example_sentence: O genç mimar yeni projeyi düşünmezse, şirket zarar görecek.
english_example_sentence: If that young architect doesn't think about the new project, the company will suffer loss.
russian_example_sentence: Если тот молодой архитектор не подумает о новом проекте, компания понесёт убытки.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: O genç mimar yeni projeyi ______, şirket zarar görecek.
